subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Mini AM/FM Hack Site

Yeah that was awesome video Mike...that I think I can do or anyone else can do just as you showed. I heard them say your name did you? I also heard someone elses name.
   
  I also got a chance to catch up on Franks videos hehehe again I'm hearing some results in there responding to your chatter. Gotta love the live feedback! I have been getting that alot lately using different methods.
   
  Misty
   
  

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          Even better! I thought those were FM only. 
 
 Frank


    
---------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com

Date: Sun, 25 Nov 2007 23:12:29 +0000
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Mini AM/FM Hack Site

The video links of me doing the mods are at:

http://www.ufogeek.com/12-470mod.wmv

and

http://www.ufogeek.com/12-469mod.wmv

-Mike

the

mod.
